title: HOLY HOLY HOLY LORD GOD ALMIGHTY

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Holy, holy, holy, Lord God almighty,
Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee;
Holy, holy, holy, merciful and mighty,
God in three Persons, blessed Trinity!

sections.title: Chorus
content: Holy, holy, holy! All the saints adore Thee,
Casting down their golden crowns around the glassy sea;
Cherubim and seraphim fall down before Thee,
Who was, and is, and evermore shall be.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Holy, holy, holy! Though the darkness hide Thee,
Though the eye of sinful man Thy face may not behold;
Only Thou art holy; there is none beside Thee,
Perfect in power, in love, and purity untold.
